thread.title: Lake Highlands homeowner shoots 15-year-old burglary suspect
thread.title_full: Lake Highlands homeowner shoots 15-year-old burglary suspect

author: Claire Z. Cardona
title: Lake Highlands homeowner shoots 15-year-old burglary suspect
text:
A Lake Highlands homeowner who arrived home Tuesday evening confronted two suspected burglars and shot one, a teen, police said. 
The incident occurred about 5:20 p.m. in the 9700 block of Estate Lane, near Audelia Road. The homeowner shot one of the suspected burglars, a 15-year-old, police said. 
The teen has injuries not believed to be life-threatening. The second suspect remains at large. View Comments
